resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove this shortcut to %s?
If leaved empty, Application name will be used
Trust Security & Communications is a privately owned company offering you the latest in security solutions as well as the personal attention you need to see your project through from start to end.

We strive to provide cutting edge technology & security solutions for all our customers, commercial & residential alike. We dedicate ourselves to providing timely installations, service & support. We make every effort to achieve unsurpassed customer satisfaction & loyalty.

All of our employees are knowledgeable, responsible, courteous & honest. We maintain strict hiring guidelines including background checks, personal references & more. We require full employee participation at our monthly safety & training meetings, keeping our team up to date with all the latest industry developments. We also conduct periodical employee evaluations, to enable our team to maintain their peak performance standards. In addition, we offer a wide range of employee resources to allow for further growth.
If you\'d like like more control over what happens in your home while you\'re away or greater comfort while you are in it.
